name: Unipop
description:
Inspired by the soon-to-be-popular game Cone Pop, I present to you Unipop!

Move your unicorn about, using the mouse! Or a touchscreen, if you're fancy.

Pop the volleyballs, which can be easily punctured by your unicorn's pointy horn!

Avoid the magic 8-balls, which will snap off your unicorn's horn like a twig!

And for some reason your unicorn will spontaneously combust if it goes too far to the edges of the screen.

This game doesn't contain any pancakes, thoughtful or otherwise, making it suitable for vegans and the gluten-intolerant alike.

Leaderboard

Behold... the leaderboard! This should update with any new scores. If you've just achieved a score, try refreshing the page and watch your name appear to the world!

Entries may be removed for any reason, but the obvious ones are if an offensive/abusive name is used or the score is clearly cheated.

(open leaderboard in new tab) Sources

As usual, I didn't make anything myself. You can obtain all assets used from the following links:

  • Balloon pop 1, 2, 3; twig snap 1, 2, 3
  • Background, volleyball, 8-ball, star, unicorn, wheel, fire
  • Raeleus Scriptius font

Licence
Sound effects by https://picturetosound.com
